definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: I just have very bad sense of direction.
Is there a sense-of-direction centre in the brain?
sentences.chinese: 大脑里有方向感中心吗？

sentences.english: Suddenly the corridor of forest is gone. In its place is sheer disorientation.
sentences.chinese: 突然森林走廊消失了，在森林走廊里没有方向感。

sentences.english: Your sense of direction is amazing, Mr. Dewey.
sentences.chinese: 你的方向感可真行，杜威先生。

sentences.english: Chaos creates the desire for a return to stability, for a sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 混乱会激起人们回归稳定，寻求方向感的渴望。

sentences.english: You become disoriented and start to sink.
sentences.chinese: 方向感尽失的您，开始往下沉。

sentences.english: This little change in routine helps the brain practice special memory and directions.
sentences.chinese: 这个小的改变帮助大脑练习特殊的记忆力和方向感。

sentences.english: As a result, our self-esteem takes a big hit because we have lost our sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 结果因为失去了方向感，我们的自尊受到打击。

sentences.english: The man shook his head, as he continued to suck air and orient himself.
sentences.chinese: 那人摇了摇头，他继续吸着气使自己恢复方向感。

definition: person with a poor sense of direction
east, south, west and north/all directions
sixth sense (i.e. intuition, premonition, telepathy etc)
to lose the way/lost/labyrinth/labyrinthus vestibularis (of the inner ear)
